mapper.sql: USR_ID, ORG_ID, USR_NAME, USR_PSW, USR_REAL_NAME, USR_DESC, USR_STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM, TREE_CODE

USR_ID as usrId, ORG_ID as orgId, USR_NAME as usrName, USR_PSW as usrPsw, USR_REAL_NAME as usrRealName, USR_DESC as usrDesc, USR_STATUS as usrStatus, LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime, FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES as failLoginTimes, CRE_OBJ as creObj, CRE_TIM as creTim, UPD_OBJ as updObj, UPD_TIM as updTim
mapper.select:
select distinct u.USR_NAME as usrName, si.SYS_ID as sysId, i.PARENT_ITM_ID as parentItmId,i.ICON as icon, i.ITM_ID as 'key',i.ITM_NAME as 'text',i.ITM_TYP as itmTyp,i.ITM_URL as 'to' from AUTH_USR u, AUTH_USR_ROLE ur, AUTH_ROLE r,AUTH_ROLE_ITEM ri, AUTH_ITEM i, AUTH_SYS_INF si where u.USR_ID=ur.USR_ID and ur.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID and r.ROLE_ID=ri.ROLE_ID and ri.ITM_ID=i.ITM_ID and si.SYS_ID=i.SYS_ID and r.ROLE_ID is not null and r.IS_USE='1' and i.ITM_ID is not null and i.IS_USE='1' and i.PARENT_ITM_ID != '000' and u.USR_ID = #{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and si.SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and length(trim(i.PARENT_ITM_ID))=3
and length(trim(i.PARENT_ITM_ID))>3
order by i.ITM_ID

select u.USR_ID as usrId, u.ORG_ID as orgId,o.ORG_NAME as orgName, u.USR_NAME as usrName, u.USR_PSW as usrPsw, u.USR_REAL_NAME as usrRealName, u.USR_DESC as usrDesc, u.USR_STATUS as usrStatus, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime, u.FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES as failLoginTimes, u.CRE_OBJ as creObj, u.CRE_TIM as creTim, u.UPD_OBJ as updObj, u.UPD_TIM as updTim from AUTH_USR u left join AUTH_ORG o on u.ORG_ID=o.ORG_ID where u.USR_ID = #{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select u.USR_ID as usrId,r.ROLE_ID as roleId,r.ROLE_NAME as roleName from AUTH_USR u left join AUTH_USR_ROLE ur on u.USR_ID=ur.USR_ID left join AUTH_ROLE r on ur.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID where u.USR_ID = #{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.ROLE_ID is not null

select
from AUTH_USR
USR_STATUS=#{usrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} and USR_ID in
#{item}
mapper.update: update AUTH_USR set USR_STATUS=#{0}, UPD_TIM=#{3},UPD_OBJ=#{2} where USR_ID = #{1}
update AUTH_USR set ORG_ID='' where ORG_ID=#{0}
mapper.insert: insert into AUTH_USR (USR_ID, ORG_ID, USR_NAME, USR_PSW, USR_REAL_NAME, USR_DESC, USR_STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM) values (#{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{failLoginTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creTim,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update AUTH_USR
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USR_NAME = #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USR_PSW = #{usrPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPD_OBJ = #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_TIM = #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
where USR_ID = #{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update AUTH_USR set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_NAME = #{usrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_PSW = #{usrPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_REAL_NAME = #{usrRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_DESC = #{usrDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USR_STATUS = #{usrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES = #{failLoginTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_OBJ = #{creObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_TIM = #{creTim,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPD_OBJ = #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_TIM = #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR} where USR_ID = #{usrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select USR_ID, ORG_ID, USR_NAME, USR_PSW, USR_REAL_NAME, USR_DESC, USR_STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, FAIL_LOGIN_TIMES, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM from AUTH_USR
